content: Ladies and Gentlemen, Please be aware of CHASE Bank. This credit card company has disturbing practices and cannot be trusted. Always be aware of late fees and other tactics. I was informed that rates increase randomly and without true justification. I will pay them off immediately. Please inform all soldiers to trust USAA and stay away from CHASE Bank Credit Cards

content: All my old plastic went into the fireplace. I now have a check card. If the $$$ is in my account I buy. If the $$$ isn't in my account I do without. My banker keeps calling me with "Great Deals." I tell her that her great deals put us in debt and she can keep them. "Back to the Past," if I don't have the money I don't buy it! How come I pressed "One for English" and still can't understand a word the dude is saying?
